stories.headline: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial told
stories.description: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles

stories.headline: How does the cutoff of Starlink terminals affect Russia’s moves in Ukraine?
stories.description: Russian drone operators have been dealt a blow, but experts say the shut-off is unlikely to change the course of war.

stories.headline: More solar farms on the way after record renewables auction
stories.description: The results have been welcomed by climate and clean energy groups but could face opposition from local communities.

stories.headline: ‘Evil deeds’: Hong Kong leader praises lengthy jail sentence for Jimmy Lai
stories.description: US, UK officials call for Jimmy Lai’s release on ‘humanitarian’ grounds due to his age and health.

stories.headline: Iran’s top security official in Oman following nuclear talks with US
stories.description: The trip by Larijani, secretary of Iran’s Supreme National Security Council, comes amid diplomatic efforts to avert war.
